title: _standardizeFunArgs works asynchronously
testError:
Timed out retrying: cy.should() failed because this element is detached from the DOM.
a
Cypress requires elements be attached in the DOM to interact with them. The previous command that ran was: > cy.wrap() This DOM element likely became detached somewhere between the previous and current command. Common situations why this happens: - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element You typically need to re-query for the element or add 'guards' which delay Cypress from running new commands. https://on.cypress.io/element-has-detached-from-dom
